snippet.title: Ghosts ‘n Goblins Resurrection – Announcement Trailer – Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
The beloved Ghosts ‘n Goblins series from Capcom makes a comeback on Nintendo Switch! Armor up as Arthur for an all-new adventure in Ghosts ‘n Goblins Resurrection, releasing on 2/25!

https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/ghosts-n-goblins-resurrection-switch/

#GnGResurrection #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
